    • Method Detail

      • getImpl

        public static ApplicationFacadeInterface getImpl()
        Initializes and returns the application facade instance.

        When getting the instance, this will truncate or initialize the database if is planned to do so.

        Returns:
        the initialized application facade instance
        See Also:
        initialize(boolean), truncate(boolean)

      • getImpl

        public static ApplicationFacadeInterface getImpl(boolean shouldTruncateDb)
        Initializes and returns the application facade instance.

        When getting the instance, this will truncate or initialize the database if is planned to do so.

        Parameters:
        shouldTruncateDb - true to remove the database tables content, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the initialized application facade instance
        See Also:
        initialize(boolean), truncate(boolean)

      • getImpl

        public static ApplicationFacadeInterface getImpl(boolean shouldTruncateDb,
                                                 boolean shouldInitializeDb)
        Initializes and returns the application facade instance.

        When getting the instance, this will truncate or initialize the database if is planned to do so.

        Parameters:
        shouldTruncateDb - true to remove the database tables content, false otherwise
        shouldInitializeDb - true to initialize the database with data, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the initialized application facade instance
        See Also:
        truncate(boolean), initialize(boolean)

      • isTruncateEnabled

        public static boolean isTruncateEnabled()
        Return if is planned to truncate the database in the next call of getImpl()
        Returns:
        true if is planned to truncate, false otherwise

      • truncate

        public static void truncate(boolean truncateDb)
        Set to truncate the database data in the next call of getImpl()
        Parameters:
        truncateDb - true to plan to truncate the database, false otherwise

      • isInitializeEnabled

        public static boolean isInitializeEnabled()
        Return if is planned to initialize the database data in the next call of getImpl()
        Returns:
        true if is planned to initialize the database with data, false otherwise

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(boolean initializeDb)
        Set to initialize the database data in the next call of getImpl()
        Parameters:
        initializeDb - true to plan the database initialization with data, false otherwise
